Articles.Content:
How do I remove a part from staging in KSP 1.9 Stock?

 

I have a hardpoint pylon or whatever the heck they're called and I want to remove them from staging.

If it allows you to, you can right click it in the VAB and remove it from staging.

If it doesn't... then no clue. I don't think you can. You can drag it all the way up to the top so it will never trigger but that's about the best you can do.

Yeah, for those parts it's just right-click and toggle  "Decoupler: Disable Staging"

I wish every part (including engines) had that ability!

Edited March 2, 2020 by XLjedi
